Package edu.odu.cs.cs350.acmClassifier

package edu.odu.cs.cs350.acmClassifier
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Document
    Document class that has the file name, the list of words needed for classification and the list of classifications
    DocumentReader
    This is supposed to read each document by passing it's path and check the file's formatting.
    Librarian
    Class used for classifying documents through ML
    Main
    The class whose sole purpose is to house the main function
    Parser
    A class created for the purpose of performing complex parsing functions on a document's raw text, such as removing punctuation and making all words all lowercase
    StopList
    List containing all the stop words (common words) There will only be one instance of stop list, for our purposes at least
    Trainer
    Class used to retrain/ fine tune ML network
